name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: AcceleRacers Free Pack 3
description: From Team Teku, please welcome Battle Spec: created to impress with its beauty and its speed, it's ready for any battle on the track. While Jack Hammer from Team Metal Maniacs team stands out for its asymmetric wheels, hammering his opponents with star performances.

description: Sin descripción

name: Ace Attorney Anthology
description: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy & Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy!

name: Ein's Sword 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Rug Rats
description: Don't let it escape, germs, suck it up and roll it up! !

name: Hentai Girls: Racy Racer
description: Meet over 30 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Break It
description: Break It is a fast paced casual game.

name: The Zen of Kayaking
description: An 80KB interactive-fiction text adventure game that begins as you set out with your newly acquired kayak one weekend. Created over 10 days by a team of two.

name: Pinball M: Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball
description: Put on the mask and rev the chainsaw - Leatherface returns to slaughter in pinball form! Aim your shots and use all your skills to take out your victims in one of the most brutal pinball tables ever created.

name: Construction Simulator: Stadium Expansion
description: Ready, set, goal? Wait a second! For thrilling soccer matches you'll need an equally impressive venue - and the Stadium Expansion for Construction Simulator is your chance to build a stadium including related facilities.

name: Ultimate General: American Revolution - Premium Edition
description: The Premium Edition is a tribute to our most dedicated fans and supporters. By purchasing the Premium Edition, you are not only getting access to all the exclusive content of the Premium Edition but also showing your support for the continued development and expansion of the Ultimate General series.

name: Boxmania
description: Boxmania is a 2D puzzle game designed to be challenging, fun, and to make the player think on every level. Each of the 50 levels is created to show unique aspects of the simple concept of moving boxes, all while being possible. After completion, enjoy the other equally fun game modes.

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Battle Pack 2
description: The pack tracks the 4th Infantry Division on D-Day and the 101st Airborne Division till June 13, 1944. This date marks a milestone in the Normandy campaign as Carentan is secured, and a linkup between American beaches is established, symbolizing the campaign's initial success.

name: Critical Strike Shooter: SWAT Rescue Missions
description: Become an elite operative, rescue hostages, win glory. Intense rescue missions await!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Crusade of Chasing Shadows
description:
Version 7.5 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter 3: A Crime Foretold
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Lone Destruction: Shadowchaser (Lantern)
• New Featured Event: Lantern Against Shadows
• New Event: Non-Stop Stage Clears Carnival
• ...and more!

name: The Gap
description: An abstract interactive experience about a Gap

name: Hup Hup The Cupcake
description: High jump, long jump, and wall jump your way through an endless array of procedurally generated levels set above the clouds! Customize the length and difficulty of your journey to your liking in Hup Hup The Cupcake, the relaxing 3D precision platformer!

name: Bungo's Bungite Collector
description: Collect all of the rarest Bungites and level them up so you can show them off to your friends! Gather Bungcoin to get rarer Bungites, debate them, and watch their stats grow to infinity!

name: Ant Attack
description: Ant Attack - A peculiar blend of Clicker and Tower Defense.

name: Bunny Space Odyssey: The Countdown
description: Seek out and collect bunny helmets scattered across the laboratory. But wait, bunny helmets with ears? Perhaps the veil of mystery will be lifted, revealing why we're collecting these ear-topped helmets?

name: Satan Moans
description: Are you ready for an adrenaline-fueled adventure with "Satan Moans"? In this horror-packed game, you'll explore the supernatural events surrounding a teenager returning home in the dead of night. Are you ready to dive into a suspenseful universe?

name: Dish Up Fruit
description: Dish Up Fruit is a 3D puzzle game where you combine fruits and arrange them on a plate. Enjoy the colorful design and changing fruits as you play. Load up on lots of fruit and beat your high score now!

name: AsiaKingdom
description: AsiaKingdom is an exciting hidden object 3D puzzle game in an Asian setting. There are many objects on the location, there are numerous pavilions, fountains, bridges and other Asian decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

name: Office Dreaming
description: Office Dreaming is an exciting 3D puzzle game for finding objects in a cozy office. There are many items on the location, there are numerous tables, office equipment, gaming tables and other office decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

name: Escape from Hornhead
description: Escape from Horn head is 3D horror game. You need to find the keys and potions before he catches up with you. Explore the rooms, look for objects and avoid the pursuer. Try to find the best way, remember the movement of the Horned-headed demon chasing its victim, that is, you.

name: Hyperforma: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: MyRummy
description: Long-lasting fun for the whole family

name: Shoot Star
description: Enjoy boss battles in a cartoon world! "ShootStar" is a 2D shooting action boss battle game.

name: Vest A Life
description: The world is finally in an unreturnable condition. war, chemicals, nuclear, global warming, and widespread plastic pollution causing problems that are too late to fix, and now all humanity pays the price for it. Play as a survivor in Post-apocalypse 'Phuket'. Find resources in the MMO world of VAL.

name: Cricket Captain 2024
description: Build your own dream team with Cricket Captain 2024. New commentary from Daniel Norcross tells the story of your matches. Honours boards showing every international century and five-wicket hall across all formats at every ground. Score predictor helps you manage your matches.

name: Lifting Unlimited
description: Lifting Unlimited is a fun, fast-paced, strategic lifting game. Train in the Bench Press, Squat, and Deadlift to increase your total through difficult progression. Compete in state, national, and international competitions to set Earth-shattering Records! Start your weightlifting journey today!

name: Eye To Me
description: "Eye To Me" is a modern-era adventure game. I am creating your "video game" and showing it while eating fries at a store. I wanted a place to share memories with you. You stare at me with big eyes.

name: Death by Deduction
description: Death by Deduction is a unique blend of logic puzzle and classic murder mystery set in an old English manor during the 1970s. Explore the manor, examine evidence, and question suspects to deduce who the murderer is in "Death by Deduction".

name: Vanakatu
description: A surreal story-driven game that uses puzzle-solving, turn based battling, and open world navigation to help Van Cat track down his evil uncle and put an end to his nefarious plans!

name: Maka Dash
description: "Maka Dash" is a unique parkour game where you'll take on the role of an agile young girl, embarking on an adventurous journey!

name: Crabity
description: Embark on a cosmic adventure as a duo of two robot crabs stranded in the vastness of space. See the world from a different angle and utilize the power of gravity to escape the space station and return back to Earth!

name: Silent Code
description: A VR role-playing game set against the backdrop of the Chinese Red Revolution

name: Deadlands Duel: Time Rift Rumble
description: Deadlands Duel is a wave-based zombie defense shooter that takes place throughout all of history via time travel. You will fight hoards of zombies with various weapons and armaments. Choose one of four class types to specialize your gameplay to fit your desired role in this team-play focused arena.

name: Let Me Sleep
description: A spooky puzzle adventure, in which the task is to help a rather sleepy fellow catch some rest… In a haunted house. Look for secrets, avoid obstacles… And Let Him Sleep!

name: Rabbids: Legends of the Multiverse
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives+: Persona 3: Aegis The First Mission
description: The setting is Yakushima in 1999. A story depicting Aegis' unknown past.

name: Everlasting Snooze
description: You lost your memory of nothing but a mundane day. But why do mysterious men keep jamming into your life, all of them pointing to the day you forgot? Find out a hypnosis clinic receptionist's memory of an insignificant day in this BL visual novel.

name: Beat in Zero
description: Your choices will determine your destiny.The deck-building RPG "Beat in Zero" is a game where you choose one of three characters and go on a quest to find the "0 card" lying at the bottom of the floor.Randomly generated events and cards take you on a different adventure each time.

name: HighScore Anomaly Underground
description: Observe your surrounding and be confident there is or is not a anomaly to progress

name: Aery: Peace of Mind
description: Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Amazing Grace
description: A cute, bouncy 2d Platformer about jumping down from heaven to rescue your child from hell.

name: Maple & Rufus: The Water Robbery
description: Maple & Rufus: The Water Robbery is an escape room style game where you must solve multiple puzzles and riddles to uncover who is stealing water from the citizens of Pumpkin Hollow.

name: Tiny Ski
description: Welcome to Tiny Ski Resort! Where pixel art, skiing, multiplayer races, and a beautiful story all come together.

name: Greed and Fear and the Rest
description: You are ready to say goodbye to life, but are you prepared to face your life's truth? Navigate a grad student's life between greed and fear in his final 6 hours (and beyond) in this BL visual novel.

name: Stock: Retail investors
description: Master a simulated economy and stock market as an investor. Manage assets, debt, and risks to strategize investments amidst market fluctuations. Achieve success through smart risk-taking and financial planning.

name: Asta-Pool: Can Humans Beat Bots?
description: Everybody loves playing pool, especially if it's in outer-space against robots! Asta-Pool is a casual game - perfect for humans who have never played and those whose friends call them 'shark'. Play old favorites, discover cool, futuristic games, and help J.J. prove that humans can still beat bots!

name: House Flipper: Pop Art Furniture Pack
description: Behold the mind-bending creations from the most twisted imaginations! You'll discover items that defy convention and redefine the meaning of pop-art. Post-modern sofas, freaky chairs, and gripping dressers? We've got it all!

name: Astra Nova
description: Astra Nova is a RPG set in a universe on the brink of destruction, offering players a blend of immersive storytelling, strategic gameplay, and next-gen rewards.

name: Space Battle: Mayhem
description: Get ready to expand your space experience with the exciting DLC "MAYHEM" for Space Battle! This downloadable content pack brings with it a new, more challenging game mode where you will have to defeat as many ships as possible.

name: Hairdresser Simulator: Beards and Mustaches
description: Master the perfect shave with the Beards and Mustaches DLC! Shave, clip, and style beards to meet your clients' needs. Transform your salon into the establishment of choice for discerning gentlemen. Elevate their style and make each customer feel like a king.

name: Down Word
description: Create four letter words with falling tiles before the screen fills. Utilize powerups and careful preparation to create multiple words at once to achieve multiplier bonuses!

name: The Smurfs: Village Party
description: Papa Smurf has decided to organize an exceptional party! Embark on a party game set in the Smurfs' Village, featuring an adventure mode.

name: Pro Cycling Manager 2024
description: Become a sports director, take part in the world's top cycling races and lead your riders to victory. Set race objectives, negotiate contracts, find new sponsors and build your team season after season.

name: Tour de France 2024
description: Win a Grand Tour and claim the yellow jersey in the official game of the Tour de France 2024. Beat your opponents, push yourself to the limit and show what you're capable of in the new multiplayer mode: Criterium.

name: Farmcoz
description: Cozy Sandbox Game about Farming and Building. It's raining outside? Just chill and relax with warm and cheerful atmosphere of Farmcoz. Farm, Build, Explore, Explode and Unlock all items. Good luck!

name: ShitMan
description: ShitMan - joyful meat pigeon bullet screen shooting game! The game will make you feel refreshed from start to finish, fighting and brushing! Meanwhile, It is also a joyful story about sudden death and the regeneration of a pile of feces. Life is indeed a pile of shit, but please be your own ShitMan!

name: Touhou Spell Carnival
description: Touhou Spell Carnival is a strategy role-playing video game developed by Sting and published by Compile Heart.

name: Whispers in the Dark
description: Whispers in the Dark is an online cooperative RPG horror game mixing exploration phases of haunted and management places. Improve your character, his knowledge of the paranormal, his skills and his tools thanks to a research system.

name: Detective: Minerva Case
description: DETECTIVE Minerva Case is a crime deduction and solving game, with an adult and original story. Visit the crime scene, look for all the evidence and understand what happened.

name: Welcome to Primrose Lake 2
description: The mystery continues in the highly anticipated sequel to Welcome to Primrose Lake!

name: Graphsx
description: You turned on your monitor right now? It isn't giving to you a image? Maybe the pixels of your monitor is in to a journey; why you don't help them in this hard physics-based puzzle platform journey. Explore hundreds of challenges, become more and more sharper and find out more about a pixel journey.

name: End The World
description: Bring the End of the World in this story-driven retro title about love and hate, light and dark, and all the ways everything could end in a snap. Play as multiple characters as you traverse the kingdom of Ionis trying to put an end to tyranny by any means possible.

name: Rune Gate
description: Rune Gate is a deck-building roguelite where you design your own cards by slotting in runes of various elements. Gather your party, craft your runes, gear up and defend against hordes of enemies from the Rune Gate. How long can you survive?

name: Sneak Out
description: Sneak Out is a crazy hide & seek game in a huge magical castle with up to 5 hiders playing against one dangerous seeker. Maybe you will be sneaky enough to complete all the tasks and get out of the mysterious castle or enough determined to hunt everyone else down.

name: Silent Slayer: Vault of the Vampire
description: Vanquish an ancient vampiric council in this suspenseful single-player jumpscare game.

name: The Hidden Room: Pyramid
description: Continue your adventure in The Hidden Room with The Hidden Room: Pyramid! After what happened in Tom Barkley's house, you think that it's not over yet. That something else might have been hidden. This is your chance to find it out...again

name: Deformed
description: Single player horror game set in a underground lab. Kill monsters and escape.

name: Savage: Ultimate Boss Fight
description: Savage is a single-player action game that allows players to experience MMORPG-style battles. Many bosses are included this game. Unravel the gimmicks hidden in the attacks, find a strategy, and try to clear the stage.

name: Lumnis
description: Embark on an epic Action-Adventure journey to become the next Guardian of Lumnis, a secret place full of wonders and mysteries. To prove yourself worthy of this role, you will have to explore dark caves, fight relentless foes and climb your way up many summits.

name: Blockbuster Inc.
description: A movie-studio simulation game where you get to construct all the facilities, manage all of your employees and produce cutting-edge films and Tv shows in order to top your competition.

name: Chornobyl Liquidators
description: Chornobyl Liquidators is not a fantastic tale of exploring the Zone. It's a story about real people facing a real threat — the CNPP disaster. Invisible radiation, KGB, difficult moral choices... Do you have enough courage and strength to take on this challenge?

name: Kristala
description:
Kristala is a dark fantasy ARPG featuring Sekiro-inspired combat, acrobatic parkour, and exploration to uncover a detailed story. Embark on a journey to join ranks with Ailur’s most elite warriors as you battle to master the ancient magic of the Sacred Six and uncover the source of a dark curse.

Play as a catlike warrior from one of six clans, each with its own unique magic specialty. Choose your own style of combat: avoid damage by blocking, dashing/rolling, and deflecting attacks; combo light and heavy attacks; utilize multiple weapon abilities; and cast numerous spells.

Your catlike character will be fully customizable via various Talent Trees, including an innovative Feline Skill tree that allows you to unlock and level a multitude of feline-related skills.

name: Autopsy Simulator
description: Autopsy Simulator is a first-person horror-sim hybrid where players take on the role of a practice pathologist and study case files, created in collaboration with real-world forensic doctors, to help guide their dissection of anatomically accurate bodies to determine each subject’s cause of death.

name: Pagliaccionautas
description: This mechanism now in your hands is not exactly a game. I'm not going to say it isn't a game; who am I to deny you the right to play? What I call a "cursed tool" is a synthetic studio. You take on the role of The Clown, an inquisitive and scathing fellow, determined to fulfill his mission: to form the perfect team of Paglaccionautas.

name: Workplace Fantasy: Raina's Ending
description: Free update DLC No.1: Raina's new story and ending.

name: Beach Ping Pong Babes VR
description: This is a summer -filled VR table tennis game, allowing players to feel the charm of beach table tennis on the hot summer day. The background of the game is set on a beautiful and golden beach. The waves patted the shore gently, giving a quiet and comfortable feeling.

name: Tetris Block Puzzle
description:
Embark on a thrilling adventure - Tetris Block Puzzle

Welcome to Tetris Block Puzzle, the ultimate mobile game that combines the timeless fun of block puzzles with the iconic Tetris brand.

Unleash Tetris exclusives, clear Tetriminos, and aim for high scores!
Challenge yourself with strategic gameplay, carefully planning your moves to create perfect Line Clears.
No internet connection is needed! Play anytime, anywhere, and immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Tetris Block Puzzle.
Clear rows consecutively to earn incredible combos and showcase your Tetris Block Puzzle skills!

A new Block Puzzle Game with a Tetris twist!
Same iconic blocks, new fun game!

name: Omnimancer
description: Roguelite-style game in which you must explore an ancient tomb filled with dangers and practically infinite magic

name: Neopets: Tales of Dacardia
description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey in Dacardia, an idyllic island devastated by a mysterious storm, in Neopets: Tales of Dacardia.

As the new Town Planner, you'll work alongside the Dacardian community to restore the land they call home and uncover clues to reveal the truth behind the storm. Was it a natural disaster, or is there something more sinister at play?

Uncover the strange and surprising secrets of this remote corner of Neopia!

name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer Ezmerelda Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Ezmerelda (if you don't already have them) Wyrm Slayer Ezmerelda Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Ezmerelda 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Ezmerelda Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Rocket League: Season 15
description:
Rocket League gets a punk rock makeover for the “SoCal” Season 15! Swerve into Salty Fest and start breaking conventions.

Put your hands, horns, and cars in the air and make some noise for the launch of Rocket League Season 15! This Season sounds off on June 5.
⁠
⁠In Season 15, hit the ground spinning on a grassier new variant of Salty Shores. Just take it easy on the donuts as you tear up the field with Rocket League’s newest sports cars!

name: Shopping Clutter: Halloween Mystery
description: An antique store transformed into Dracula’s lair… a thief in the town of Animalville… what’s next?!

name: Shopping Clutter: Spring Blossom
description: Whether you’re helping Auntie Sheep decorate her flower shop, or serving delicious coffee in the mornings… Animalville needs you!

name: Shopping Clutter: Winter Break
description: All kinds of holidays are coming up… from winter festivities to celebrations of love! Can you ensure everything goes off without a hitch?

name: The Fog
description: You discovered a strange place in the woods and decide to explore it. But beware, a terrifying monster roams the forest, always on the hunt. Your mission: gather 12 keys to unlock the nearby cabin and escape the creature.

name: Neon Doctrine's Greatest Hits Vol. 1
description: Lost Castle, The Legend of Tianding, and Yuppie Psycho. Three different games with almost nothing in common. Nothing that is, except they all captured your hearts.

name: 10 in 1 Classic Games Pack
description: Collection of awesome, family friendly games! Dive into it, play solo or together with other players!

name: Octopath Traveler + Octopath Traveler II Bundle
description: Two HD-2D RPGs from SQUARE ENIX’s Team Asano, OCTOPATH TRAVELER and OCTOPATH TRAVELER II are now available as a bundle! This series features distinctive HD-2D graphics that combine pixel art with 3D.

name: Extreme Climbing
description: In extreme climbing, there are various well-known tower shaped buildings that are impossible or even prohibited to climb in reality, to challenge the natural reaction of fear of heights and fully enjoy the fun of climbing. Welcome everyone to experience "Extreme Climbing"!

name: Fishing Planet: Japan Odyssey Pack
description: Get ready for a 60-day ocean odyssey to explore the surrounding waters of Kaiji No Ri island with the Japan Odyssey Pack. Bring along your friends on the luxurious Volans fishing yacht!

name: Pixel Playground
description: A little box of pixels I made specially for you :)

name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer Ravengard Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Duke Ravengard (if you don't already have them) Wyrm Slayer Ravengard Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Duke Ravengard 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Duke Ravengard Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: The Unseen Fears: Fortune's Consequence - Collector's Edition
description: Can you escape an ancient ice spirit before it's too late?

name: Fishing Planet: Ocean Voyager Pack
description: Go on a 30-day ocean fishing voyage in the waters of Kaiji No Ri island aboard the swift Scutum fishing yacht with the Ocean Voyager Pack! The yacht comes with 6 rod holders (2 for each player) and enough space to store the catch of each of three anglers onboard.

name: Below Level
description: Navigate through an underground parking lot in search of four important cars. Armed with only a phone, evade the abnormals that are sent to intercept you and make it out alive.

name: Twinworld Survivor
description: Twinworld Survivor is a survival roguelite where you play a girl just become an investigator and entered the twinworld by accident. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds, and defeat waves of monsters to survive, and uncover the secrets of the twinworld.

name: DCS World: OH-58D Kiowa Warrior
description: Experience the ultimate in rotary-wing aviation with the OH-58D Kiowa Warrior in DCS World. This meticulously crafted simulation brings the legendary reconnaissance and light attack helicopter to life with unparalleled accuracy and detail.

name: Run & Jump Guy
description: Leap into "Run & Jump Guy," a pixel-packed platformer spanning three thrilling worlds: Island, Snowy Forest, and Castle. Overcome enemies and obstacles to conquer the ultimate boss!

name: Vribyss Refuge The Escape
description: While fleeing from the Kexxrans, Isla falls deep into a cave. As she searches for a way out, she encounters mysterious beings trapped there that may be able to help her get out. Discover the mysteries of Vribyss in this short-action role-playing story-driven game!

name: Hide and Seek
description: In Hide and Seek, players get to choose whether they want to be the one hiding or seeking.

name: Harem Nanka Nozondenai!: Undesired Harem
description: A sudden harem situation?! His heart must decide between 4 beautiful girls!

name: Nether Heroes
description: Immerse yourself in Nether Heroes, an intense action-platform roguelike game. Conquer challenging dungeons, face menacing creatures, and defeat powerful bosses on your epic adventure.

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box: Mystical Worlds by RiaStarchild
description: 10 beautifully hand drawn mystical worlds from RiaStarchild to puzzle.

name: Puzzlemazed
description: Classic Arcade, 2D, Puzzle and Mazed, pixel art. Easy to Play, Hard to Complete. Puzzlemazed is one genuine medieval challenge. The ancient lands of Atlas, dominated by three kingdoms. Humans coexisted with the Titans in perfect harmony, Discover the history of one great adventure.

name: Anandala
description: Anandala is a virtual reality art experience where you explore a vast labyrinth of ever-changing, psychoactive abstract art and interact with curious and expressive artificial-life creatures.

name: There's No Socks: The Extra Challenge
description: Are you ready for the extra challenge? Test yourself against 5 additional levels and in the dark mode!

name: The Adventures of Prince Shiratama: Climb the Mountains
description: Aim for the top of the mountain with Prince Shiratama. Highly difficult platformer game with a casual appearance.

name: Bad Birds
description: Sin descripción

name: MFC: Midnight Fight Club
description: Step into the ring and prepare for the ultimate fighting experience!

name: Genshin Impact: An Everlasting Dream Intertwined
description:
Version 4.7 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Clorinde, Sigewinne and Sethos
• New main story quest: Chapter IV: Act VI - Bedtime Story
• New story quests for Clorinde and Sigewinne
• New gameplay mode: Imaginarium Theater
• New quality of life features
• New main event: Mutual Security Enhancing Simulation
• …and more!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Manchester
description: Explore the Airport Manchester - the largest British airport outside the London metropolitan region.

name: There's No Socks
description: Have you ever struggled to find the second sock? That's because there's no socks! There's No Socks is a hidden object game with a selection of 4 locations and random socks to find for each of them.

name: Money Money Run
description: "Money Money Run" challenges players to confront a fundamental question: Are you in control of your finances, or are they controlling you?

name: ZigZag Drifter
description: ZigZag Drifter is a thrilling driving game that puts you behind the wheel of a car that doesn't quite behave like a typical vehicle.

name: The Untouchable Man
description: "From the moment we enter this world, the instinct to protect ourselves is ingrained within us.

name: Town Police Simulator
description: In the immersive world of Town Police Simulator, the once serene streets now hum with an unsettling energy, signaling a city teetering on the edge of chaos.

name: Land of Zombies
description: Welcome to the heart-pounding adventure of Land of Zombies, where survival is your only option in a world ravaged by the undead.

name: Love Red
description: This is an independent game! It's quite difficult! You need to have love, courage, and wisdom to pass the level! It has a unique gameplay. I hope you can experience endless fun from it! This is definitely worth it! Hope everyone likes it! I will do better!

name: Moonlight Rabbits
description: Dive into the serene world of Moonlight Rabbits, an idle game where you help adorable rabbits build a tower to the Moon by collecting carrots. Unlock unique rabbits, enjoy relaxing gameplay, and achieve your lunar dreams in this charming adventure!

name: Laruaville 15
description: Help the Alien restore his crashed UFO and find the way home!

name: Roiders
description: Become an asteroid miner and loot your way to supremacy! Fight waves of vicious aliens or battle against your friends.

name: PixAnt Farm (Idle)
description: This idle game allows you to simulate and grow a colony of pix-ants. You can watch as they autonomously explore the screen, eating pellets, and earning you new ant colorations and automatic feeder upgrades. You can also give the ants names, and interact with them in various ways.

name: Hidden Chibis in Combinis
description: Hidden Chibis in Combinis is a FREE hidden object game asking you to find cute Chibis hidden in Combinis. Can you find them all?

name: Body of Mine
description: Body of Mine is an award-winning VR experience that allows you to step into the body of another gender and discover the stories of transgender individuals.

name: Escape The Void
description: Escape The Void First Person is a single-player cooperative horror exploration game. In this game consisting of different levels, your only goal is to survive and find the exit. While doing this, you will need to use your logic, solve puzzles and take each step carefully. You must be alert to the..

name: The Young Captain
description: It's a test of strategy, resource management, and leadership as you navigate the delicate balance between preparation and confrontation.

name: Omega Knockout: Punch Boxing
description: Dodge, block and punch your opponents in Omega Knockout, a retro arcade boxing experience that packs a punch! With its vibrant 16-bit art style and gameplay-driven animations, you'll enjoy precision and excitement in every match.

name: Remission
description: Remission - Due to a Radioactive accident at the Hospital, Cancer cells have mutated into human form. It is up to You to save the city.

name: Microdistrict
description: A short visual novel about mysticism in a post-soviet town with several endings and interactive elements.

name: Sunset Solitaire
description: Classic Solitaire with pixel perfect graphics and soothing chip tunes. Four variants with separate difficulty modes and an addicting scoring mechanism for unlocking card backs.

name: Paths of Valour
description: It is a 2D pixel role-playing game, players will play a hero, gather friends on the adventure journey to defeat the Demon King. Game content includes classic RPG elements such as turn based gameplay, random enemies, side quests, etc.

name: Echoes of Egypt
description: Master action challenges in an ancient Egyptian setting. Dodge, jump, and dance through rhythmic puzzles on animated temple carvings, enhanced by a unique 1980s Middle Eastern soundtrack. Experience dynamic gameplay where history & fantasy meet, pushing your reflexes and rhythm skills to the limits.

name: Scarry Village
description: "Scarry Village" is a thrilling game that puts the player in the shoes of a prankster trying to pull off a series of mischievous acts on a scientist.

name: Novivors
description: Unlock new heroes and abilities, collect and craft powerful equipment, path the 1000+ nodes stats tree, strategize meta-progression, customized runs, and create game-breaking synergies with 6 active classes and 36 abilities all at once in this roguelite hack and slash survivors bullet heaven game.

name: ZpellCatz: Supporter Pack
description: Do you like ZpellCatz and would you like to continue supporting its development? Then the Supporter Pack is just right for you. Receive a selection of headdresses and an exclusive Familiar as a thank you.

name: Ghost Teen Escape from Limbo
description: Make use of your newfound ghostly abilities to make your way back to the world of the living!

name: Democracy 4: Console Edition
description: Democracy 4: Console Edition lets you take the role of President / Prime Minister in one of ten countries.

name: Quadbots: The Rise of Chrono
description: Embark on a cosmic quest to retrieve shattered NOVANGEL orbs, conquer colossal guardians, and ultimately defeat Chrono. Dive into an action-packed adventure with epic battles and a gripping storyline.

name: Sanbansen
description: Introducing the sequel to the game "Nibansen" that hit 6,000 sales on Steam! If an anomaly occurs, return to the opposite elevator! Find the pattern from the repeating station platform and escape! A mysterious, respect-based escape game from the enigmatic dark ground station to the exit, "Sanbansen"

name: 3AM Corp: The Balbazar Resort
description: Beware of Balbazar in this horror/psychological thriller adventure. Evade the enigmatic Balbazar, use your wits and homemade sleuth kit to capture proof that something ominous is happening, and make it out alive. Do not get caught. The cops aren't doing anything... perhaps there's a reason.

name: Claw Clash: Cat vs. Dog Betting
description: This is a novel VR casual game that allows players to enjoy endless fun in the battle between cats and dogs.

name: DinoEscape in the Time!
description: A portal opened and launched the dinosaur into the modern world, now it's up to this dinosaur to turn on 5 generators and turn on the time machine to go back to the past.

name: Everything: All in 1
description: Everything: All in 1 offers you many different types of games in a single game package. Many different types of games such as action, platform, zombie, war, racing are waiting for you. Instead of paying for similar games one by one, you can buy all the games together at a very affordable price.

name: Manahex
description: Build your own deck and battle other mages in a world of fantasy and magic. Take control of the hexes on the board to gain mana and pay for spells and creatures.

name: Red Planet Rampage
description: Red Planet Rampage is a dieselpunk western-themed arena shooter where robots face off on Mars with wacky modular guns. Win gun parts in auctions and assemble a unique combination among hundreds of possible weapons!

name: Wedge Lock Scaffolding VR Training
description: In the VR simulator, the user will prepare the site, tools, construct three levels of the wedge scaffolding, control the horizontal level of the scaffolding parts, and mark the scaffolding as ready for use. The second member of the team will help with the task.

name: Doodle Adventure of Chameleon
description: Chameleon is a side-scrolling platformer with a hand-drawn doodle style. In this world of doodles, you will play as a chameleon created by a young boy's imagination. With the whimsical and imaginative adventures the young boy envisions, the charming chameleon embarks on thrilling adventures!

name: Cosmotroid
description: Escape from the asteroid X-474 which has been invaded by aliens. Take your weapons and destroy every enemy who tries to stop you in this amazing arcade style third person shooter game full of action, creatures and explosions.

name: Rebel!
description: Imagine yourself living under your favourite oppressive regime. Rebel! Fight waves of SWAT teams. Loot their weapons and money. Buy upgrades. Enlist allies. See your uprising crushed. Repeat. Casual top down/ dual stick shooter with short, intense gameplay and a clever AI.

name: Little Locked Rooms
description: Join mini-detectives Bo and Sherry as they try to solve mysterious disappearances and impossible murders. Inspect the crime scenes in the shape of tiny dioramas and figure out the clever tricks used by the criminal masterminds!

name: Madhouse Madness
description: A journalist decides to explore an abandoned mental hospital with a dark history of housing some of the most notorious patients in history. As the journalist explores, they encounter the unique and terrifying stories of each ghost, driven by their own individual mental illnesses.

name: Dimensional Animals
description: Five animal friends unite for one glorious purpose: recover the dog's... play ball? Explore beautiful dimensions in this metroidvania action platformer adventure!

name: SimPoly Drive
description: Welcome to our open-world transportation strategy game! Choose from a variety of vehicles to transport goods and people across a dynamic landscape. Level up and increase your income as you explore the world. Become the ultimate transportation tycoon in our thrilling new game!

name: Pool Cleaning Simulator
description: Pool Cleaning Simulator will give you the chance to become a one-person pool cleanup company that removes pool contamination, replaces filters, the disinfection and sanitizing of the pool environment in an unusual way!

name: Altf42
description: A chicken that calls itself a king! Really, who is the chicken king?Avoid more powerful traps!

name: ZpellCatz
description: ZpellCatz is an action RPG with spell casting cats. Players can explore an island with lots of randomly generated dungeons, level up and find loot.

name: The Ancients
description: The Ancients is a turn-based survival strategy game where you will manage a hunter-gatherer tribe through the ice age. Every decision you make will affect the tribe culturally and politically.

name: Aberration Analyst
description: Aberration Analyst is a game in which the player must process incomplete and unreliable data in order to identify the locations of monsters. The player is an analyst whose decisions will determine the fate of a team of monster hunters and specialists ... and the world.

name: Journey of Wrestling
description: A wrestling booking game that's easy to pick up and play with accessible depth.

name: Read This When You Turn 15
description: This is a work about family abuse, neglect, and adoption from the perspective of a sibling who cannot take care of his baby sister.

name: Legends Of Heropolis DX
description:
Build the town of Heropolis.Gather your strongest heroes and destroy Evilcorp!
The town of Heropolis has been destroyed! Can you rebuild it to be the center of justice once more?
Grow your heroes, gather your friends, and battle evil in this superhero simulation game.

name: Dance Break Dance
description: In Dance Break Dance, it's all about quick reflexes and perfect timing. Spin the crank to make your adorable dancer bust out wild moves, but be sure to stop in time! The faster you crank, the crazier the dance, and the more points you score. Can you keep up with the rhythm and become the cutest dance master?

name: No Caddie Included
description:
Crank-swing your way thru some fantastic golf-courses.
The perfect on-the-go golf "simulator".

name: FM7X: Continental Odyssey
description: Continental Odyssey, a full-fledged episode consisting of 7 single player levels, 2 of these are secret and 4 are multiplayer-only.

name: NoLimits 2: Vekoma MK1101
description: This add-on contains an additional coaster style: The Vekoma MK1101. It is a modern and popular coaster type with a sleek design.

name: City Legends: The Witness in the Rye DLC
description: Armed with your wits and courage, step into the unknown and uncover the truths that lie hidden beneath the surface of Darkwood!

name: Burn
description: Burn is a short and replayable visual novel, where you play Nina BURN, the biggest pop star in the world at the turning point of her career. Will you change pop music? Will you become a monster?

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Invasions - Season of the Reptile
description: Sin descripción

name: Poker Poker Magic
description: Embark on a magical journey with Caroline and Clovis in "Poker Poker Magic," a delightful 1v1 puzzle/action game for Playdate. Join Caroline, a spirited yet somewhat absent-minded magician-in-training, and her trusty dove, Ceres, as they set out to find a magical hat that could help Caroline ace her end-of-year exams at the Robert Houdin School of Prestidigitation. Little do they know, their adventure will lead them into a whimsical forest filled with colorful characters, including a clown, a four-eared rabbit, and a horse prince, each providing opportunities for thrilling magical duels.

name: Revenge of the Speeddemons!
description: REVENGE of the Speeddemons is the eighteenth Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping series event. Featuring 7 maps, each from a unique author, ROTS promises to throw the player headfirst into an action movie of their own starring. Fit snugly into the lead role as you blast your way through hundreds of demons mercenaries across an occupied Earth. The Rowdy Rudy resource pack replaces nearly all of the monster bestiary as well as the majority of the weapons.

name: Swampify
description: A top-down puzzle game where you place hexagon tiles to build a river and restore a swamp ecosystem

name: Mordhau: Platinum Edition
description: MORDHAU is a multiplayer medieval slasher. Create your mercenary and fight in brutal battles where you will experience fast paced combat, castle sieges, cavalry charges, and more. MORDHAU Platinum Edition contains the Main game and 7 DLC packs

name: The Ghost X: Sniper Simulator - Arsenal Expansion
description: Sin descripción

name: Devil.., Heart and Possession
description:
"If I had known this would happen, I would have killed you then, with my own hands."

Dangerous and mesmerizing demons have appeared before you in Hell after an unexplained death.

To escape Hell, you must steal their hearts!

"A kiss would be tempting, don't you think?"

With demons constantly coveting your body,
can you escape Hell in one piece?

name: Ikev
description: Ikev is a furniture assembling simulator in VR where the main antagonist is a lack of manuals! Be creative and resourceful, work through the incorrectly delivered orders, and stay diligent in furnishing your apartment.

name: Goldorak
description:
The Alcorak was destroyed by Vega's forces.
Grendizer's mission is to travel to the four corners of the planet to find each piece of debris from the device in order to be able to reconstruct it.

During his journey, Goldorak will have to face many enemies.
At the end of each level, a part of the Alcorak will be won.
When all the parts of the Alcorak have been assembled, it will then be possible to start the game again on board.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Ranger - Fluxo
description: From the far reaches of space come the incredible Fluxo! Many humans will flee from this magician of death, only to find he always has tricks up his sleeve. Fluxo is a special character skin for the Ranger Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Pampas & Selene: Supporter Pack
description:
This DLC offers extra content for Pampas & Selene that includes Skins, Pets, Special Games Modes, a Digital Game Manual, and a Special Developer OST. (Those who purchased and started the game in the first two weeks of it's release, aka Founders, already have this content as a bonus for free!)

This DLC includes:

Pets:
- Hada the Fairy
- Maggie the Cat
- Tod the Toad
- Cerdo the Pig

Skins:
- Porkchop [Pampas]
- Kleopatra [Selene]
- Cutezilla [Selene]

Game Modes:
- Explosions [Exploding Barrels!]
- Coins [No arrows or mana, only riches]
- Fast as wind [Run like the wind, unless you're hit!]
- Vampire [Drain life from kills and lose life over time]
- Hardcore Mode [You get one hit]

Special:
- A digital version of the GAME MANUAL from the MSX computer version of the game.
- A Developer OST where Fran, the developer, sings the entire soundtrack a capella.

name: Rose and Cross
description: Our main character, absorbed in the study of sects and the occult, made a big mistake by going to an abandoned farm.

name: TranceWave Neo
description: tranceWave NEO is a classic arcade twin-stick shmup, inspired by others in the "trance shooter" genre. Move, shoot, survive, and aim for a high score!

name: Red Ruins
description: Red Ruins is an asymmetric VR game created by students, where one player becomes a Demon Lord in VR, facing off against Heroes on PC. With powerful weapons and strategic gameplay, players must either vanquish their foes or join forces to conquer the Red Ruins together.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Human Klown Cosplay Pack
description: This DLC includes a full outfit, tops, bottoms, facepaints, and a Klown nose to bring it all together. All items are purely cosmetic and do not alter gameplay.

name: Total Conflict: Resistance - Eastern Airborne Forces
description: Additional research branch "Eastern Airborne Forces".

name: Destiny 2: Echoes Silver Bundle
description: Purchase the Echoes Silver Bundle and receive the Power Stance Dance Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Episode: Echoes, cosmetics, and more!

name: Ark: The Center Ascended
description: The Center is a free add-on for ARK: Survival Ascended that includes a massive new map for survivors to explore. The Center is nearly double the size of The Island, making it about 70 sq. kilometers and featuring a rich, hand-drawn Tolkien-esque aesthetic.

name: Ark: Fantastic Tames - Pyromane
description: Introducing the first of a new series of Fantastic Tames for ARK: Survival Ascended: the Pyromane! Owners of one of this new class of creatures gain access to a wondrous array of useful abilities!

name: Diabotical Rogue
description: Diabotical Rogue is an online, PvP, first-person shooter with roguelike systems. Made for FPS enthusiasts, players can experience fast-paced gameplay in buttery smooth movement, combined with the power of roguelike upgrade choices.

name: Dig
description: Dig through the earth in a remote controlled drill. Collect enough money to earn your freedom.

name: Grave Realms
description: Grave Realms is a fast and fun, arcade style twin-stick shooter with RPG elements. Powerups and elemental projectile attacks help carve your way through waves of unique enemies. Using the powerful Purge system, you decide your gameplay style! Can you survive the Grave Realms?

name: Ghosts
description: There is a war in hell too. Two factions of ghosts face each other. Pick your side and bring your army to glory!

name: Starstream
description: Starstream is a 3D action-adventure shooter. In it, the brave Arlen must reclaim Castle Starstream, seized by the corrupt Lord Nova. Arlen battles through the Keep, Great Halls, and Startower to confront Lord Nova and free the Castle.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: The Game - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Digital Deluxe Content Includes:
2 Human Characters (Mike & Debbie)
2 Klown Skins (Fryzo & Sundaze)
1 Movie Klown Skin (Bibbo)
Digital Soundtrack
Digital Art Book

name: Hamstörm
description: Hamstörm is a turn-based puzzle game where you play as a dwarf hamster who must go warn his people of the imminent invasion by the Chedd'Ore clan. Help Hamstörm make his way through the various mines, now infested with terrible rats!

name: Gym Bullies
description: Gym Bullies is a game with a story that you are racing with time and testing your typing skills~

name: Spice Trade
description: Spice Trade offers a chance to rewrite history with Abu, a young man challenging European dominance. As he inherits land in Baghdad, Abu enters the spice trade to thwart European trade monopoly. Can he reshape Europe's fate? You decide the outcome in this game of strategy and empire-building!

name: Beauty Girl Chronicles: Island Obstacle Challenge
description: On the beautiful Moon Island, an adventurous obstacle challenge is about to begin. Participants must overcome various obstacles. Only the bravest and smartest girls can emerge victorious, Let's embark on this adventure together and explore the wonderful world of courage, friendship, and victory!

name: Rocket Poker
description: Master the art of deck building in this rogue like dopamine infused poker adventure. Combine enhancements to boost your deck with up to 18 unique modifiers on each card at once.

name: SnowRunner: Season 13 - Dig & Drill
description: Season 13: Dig & Drill is included in the Year 4 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.Authorities in Almaty need your help to kickstart a new mining venture! With 2 new vehicles, run surveys, deliver equipment and reopen a cargo airport.

name: Victorious
description: Play as the Vampire anti-hero Victor in this turn-based combat RPG adventure! Bite, slash, cast spells, buy new gear, and level-up as you grind through your enemies for experience and gold! Classic RPG feel, with a new and exciting original storyline!

name: Downward: Enhanced Edition
description: Enjoy the best version of Downward, with improved graphics and new assets... Live or relive a unique experience, as this new version adds new alternative endings.

name: The Secret Weapon
description: Get ready for endless laughs with The Secret Weapon - a wacky online card game that guarantees non-stop hilarity! Challenge friends, create insane combinations, and become the champion of absurdity!

name: Up Down All-a-Round
description: Control your player's gravity up and down and all a round! Master your gravity manipulating abilites to outwit your opponents and win the game!

name: Mental Math Madness
description: An educational casual game designed to improve mental math skills. Before you are hordes of math equations that require rapid solving and shooting, all while dodging incoming projectiles. Gather gold to upgrade your lives and take on increasingly challenging levels and topics.

name: D-Hospital
description: Survival Escape ARPG Control the protagonists as they explore a dangerous hospital overrun with mutants, find other survivors, and search for an escape route.

name: The Artifact of Ancients
description: Embark on an epic journey with a courageous band of adventurers as they brave perilous landscapes and face formidable foes in their pursuit of a long-lost relic of unimaginable power.

name: Taquero Simulator
description: Clients are piling up, and they won't wait for long, mijo. Are you ready for the challenge? Prende your grill, chop your vegetables, and grab your carnes, it's time to become el mejor taquero there has ever been!

name: Tetram
description: TETRAM is a blend of mechanics reminiscent of classic block games with card memorization and spatial location. It's an innovative mechanic for those who enjoy games with similar gameplay.

name: BDSM Sex: Episode 5
description: A visual novel series with animations about a young woman exploring the world of BDSM. In this episode, Katy surrenders to both her Master and Mistress.

name: Star Wars: Hunters - Bounty Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: BossCrafter
description: Challenge various bosses designed by the director using characters with distinct traits. Study classic boss mechanics, hone your combat skills, unlock hundreds of boss abilities, unleash your creativity, and craft a boss that's uniquely yours!

name: City Legends: The Witness in the Rye - Collector's Edition
description: The line between life and death is as thin as the autumn breeze. Will you escape, or will Darkwood claim you as another victim of its harvest?

name: Rearea
description: Come explore this ever-changing and mysterious area, fight alongside your companions on the same screen, explore, collect, and build And discover new gameplay!

name: Don't Forget
description: Don’t Forget is a 3D singleplayer story and exploration game inspired by dementia. Recollect your memories by looking for clues and playing brain-stimulating minigames whilst battling the effects of dementia. Explore three different key events of your life to figure out what has happened.

name: Aidan in Danger
description: Aidan in Danger is a retro-style 2D platform game. The player takes on the role of Aidan, the guardian of the last dragon. Face challenging levels, menacing creatures, and an interdimensional villain, all while enjoying beautiful graphics and an exciting soundtrack.

name: Catarsis
description: Catarsis unfolds in a future environment and people share this place with AI robots. In the midst of chaos scientists developed a revolutionary technology which will enable cats’ intelligence to inhabit a robotic body, allowing it to liberate the world from the ruthless rule of humans.

name: We Were Monkeys
description: Trying to escape the lab with your monkey pal, your realize the experimentations made you two see things differently. Can the two of you find your way out in time ?

name: Lunarball
description: Competitive 3v3, team-based sport set in space! Kick, dribble and punch your way to victory!

name: Jim's Nightmare: Chapter 1
description: Go ahead and try a psychological point-and-click adventure and uncover the truth behind Jim's mental illness and his journey in “Jim's Nightmare". Experience the fear along being a sick bastard is why we are making this game.

name: Hidden Robo Cats: Bonus Level
description: Hidden Robo Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️

name: Hotel Business Simulator
description: Welcome, Hospitality Maestros! Dive into "Hotel Business Simulator where you craft the ultimate empire. Upgrade rooms, cater to guests' whims, set rates wisely, and maintain spotless standards. Your journey to mogul status begins now. Ready to build the hotel of your dreams? Game on!

name: Hidden Robo Cats
description: Hidden Robo Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this biggest Robo Cat factory! Beep... Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game

name: Idle Planets
description: Idle Planets is a game where your objective is to extract the maximum amount of minerals in a galaxy with different planets, aiming to become the master of the universe.

name: Mr. Mueller's Grand Experiment
description: Live as the assistant to one of history's most remarkable figures: George Mueller, a man who witnessed orphans dying young in the streets of 1830's England and decided he would care for them, no matter the cost.

name: EigenGauge
description: EigenGauge is a high speed retro racing game.

name: Splodey
description: The platformer without a jump button! Master the art of potion propulsion in this fast-paced adventure where strategy, precision, and creativity meet explosive fun.

name: Angel Pop
description: Play as a young girl in a surreal dreamworld in Angel Pop; a mixed-media multidirectional bullet hell shooter with lovingly-crafted bullet patterns and setpieces designed specifically around the Playdate screen.

name: Ultimate Chump
description: In this action packed rouge lite, you find yourself as the chump that's got to survive and eliminate swarms of horrors. Mix and match your loadout, then select various upgrades and augments as you fight to setup numerous possible builds through each playthrough.

name: Destiny 2: The Final Shape
description: The Final Shape looms—a nightmarish calcification of reality into the Witness's twisted design. Embark on a perilous journey into the heart of the Traveler, rally the Vanguard, and end the War of Light and Darkness.

name: Prisseceal, the Dazzling-and-Flaring Peach Princess
description: The year, 202X. In order to retrieve peace to the city, Sakura Himemiya transformed herself to Prisseceal, and fought against the demons.

name: Killer Klowns from Outer Space: The Game
description: Plan your own alien invasion and harvest humans as the iconic Killer Klowns, or gather a team of survivors to fight the extraterrestrial threat, in a game based on the ‘80s cult classic movie. Welcome to a new, craazzy take on the asymmetrical multiplayer horror experience!

name: Field of Glory: Kingdoms
description: Politics, religion, war. They are nothing without a legacy that can stand the test of time. Lead any nation, and turn it into a mighty kingdom in one of the most compelling grand strategy games ever created.

name: Arhaekon
description: Become an Arhaekon and recover lost treasures & knowledge, bleed your minions and forge them into something more, rebuild what has fallen into decay and lay waste to the abominations holding the world captive, in our Tactical turn-based dungeon crawler.

name: Fix it: The Handyman Simulator
description: With Fix it - The Renovation Simulator, the player experiences the profession of a craftsman in all its facets. Whether electrical work, installation, gardening or renovation - all fields of activity are covered.

name: Fireside
description: Fireside is a wholesome and calm game about the breaks on a journey. Play as a spirit who gains soul energy from the gratitude of fellow travelers. Trade and talk at the campfire, rebuild your shrine with the energy you gathered and invite friends you made along the way to visit you at your home.

name: Zero-Point
description: Zero-Point is a 3D space roguelike inspired by the indie hit FTL: Faster Than Light. Take control of a cruiser-sized spaceship crewed with up to 4 starting crew members, and travel through many regions of hostile space on your mission to save the Star Federation.

name: Star Wars: Hunters
description:
Star Wars: Hunters brings together all-new, unique Hunters from across the Star Wars galaxy each with larger-than-life personas, rich undiscovered pasts and ability sets that make them formidable combatants in The Arena.

Gear up for battle choosing from a roster of new characters, including nefarious bounty hunters, heroes of the Rebellion, Imperial stormtroopers, and everything in between. Outclass opponents by mastering advanced abilities, skills and strategies while fighting it out in intense 4v4 third-person combat and dominating opponents on the road to fame in The Arena.

Customize each Hunter by collecting and equipping them with fun and unique costumes, animations, and weapon appearances, making for an impressive competitor that stands out on the battlefield and is ready to challenge for glory.

Dazzle The Arena’s crowd, competing across multiple PVP game modes; within Escort, defense and attack skills are crucial as the team need to work together to safely escort the payload before their enemies defeat them. In Control, two teams battle it out to defeat one another and take control of the central objective area until the time runs out. Each battlefield set in The Grand Arena on Vespaara evokes iconic Star Wars locales such as Tatooine, Hoth and Endor.

name: Rolling Hills: Make Sushi, Make Friends
description: Rolling Hills is a life sim about opening your own sushi restaurant in a cozy village. Assume the “roll” of a budding sushi chef as you work to improve the lives of your neighbors and make new friends. With any luck, you’ll attract some new neighbors along the way, too!

name: The House in Fata Morgana: Remaid of Dreams
description: Remaid of Dreams is a project focused on recreating the experience of the game "The House in Fata Morgana: Dreams of the Revenants Edition" on Steam and Android, by adding numerous new features and bonuses for a more comprehensive experience of the entire The House in Fata Morgana saga.

name: Flipple
description: Flipple is a word transformation game that challenges your vocabulary and problem-solving skills! In Flipple, you start with a given word and aim to transform it into a target word by changing one letter at a time. Each change must result in a valid word, making each move a test of your word knowledge and strategic thinking.

name: Categories
description:
Discover the challenge of "Categories", a word association game that tests your ability to find links between seemingly unrelated words.

In each round, you are presented with a grid of 16 words and your task is to form four groups of four connected words. Each group must share a unique link, be it a common theme, category, or relationship. As you explore possible categories, keep in mind that the game allows for only four mistakes before ending. Play alone or compete with friends to see who can master the art of making categories!

name: Word Grid
description:
The goal is to fill the entire grid with English words while aiming for the lowest possible rarity. Each word should conform to the corresponding category for both the row and column.

Each word will produce a rarity score based on its usage by all other Word Grid players.

name: Proximity
description:
Proximity is a word-guessing game that delves deep into the semantics of language. In this game, players are challenged to uncover a hidden word through strategic guessing. Each guess is met with feedback indicating how close it is in meaning to the secret word. This proximity score guides players, helping them hone in on the secret word through associations and semantic relationships...

The game is designed to not only be fun but also educational, enhancing vocabulary and linguistic intuition. Whether you're a language lover or just looking for a fun way to challenge your mind, Proximity offers an engaging way to explore the nuances of language and the power of words. Join us and discover the excitement of finding hidden connections in the world of words!

name: Liminal Spaces Jam
description: A community map Jam inspired by images and architecture of eerie, surreal, and often bizarre spaces

name: Museum.exe
description:
Museum.exe is a virtual museum about games that have contributed to the field of game design without relying on combat, competition and violence. Games that changed the field of video games, and will be forever looked upon by generations of both players and designers alike.

This interactive museum brings its own challenges, puzzles and secrets for you to explore, in a first-person puzzler format. In it's five exhibitions, you'll get to learn about 25 games that you should probably know about, in a way you probably have not experienced before.

You can not die or win this game and at no point will you be forced to exit the museum. For your optimal experience, treat it as you would a typical museum visit.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KONT Airport
description: Ontario International Airport (ONT) is a bustling transportation hub located in the heart of Southern California, just 35 miles east of downtown Los Angeles. Realistic modeling with over 50 custom modeled buildings, taxi signs, and amazing background scenery, buildings, roads developed by FeelThere.

name: Angel Legion: Secret Gift - Purple
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Space Light
description: Get ready to embark on a thrilling space adventure across the cosmos, where you'll explore new planets, engage in thrilling space battles, and shape the fate of humanity among the stars.

name: Idle Champions: Ms. Squiggles the Octopus Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Ms. Squiggles the Octopus Familiar 4 Epic Potions of Speed 4 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 4 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 1 Potion of Polish

name: Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons Edition
description: New to The Fog? Check out Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons Edition, which includes the base game, the Dungeons and Dragons Chapter, and 2 Dungeons & Dragons Outfits: Baermar's Roadside Ambush and Vecna's Whispered One.

name: Runner
description: A speedrunning platformer. Run, jump, and slide to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Mind's Decent Bundle (Darkwood + The Gap)
description: The bundle that will challenge your grip on reality.

name: Just Find It 3: Collector's Edition
description: Explore hidden variations and engage with exciting new challenges in Just Find It 3!

name: Pulzar
description: Evade solar storms to escape galactic police.

name: Cazzarion: Car Chase
description: Sin descripción

name: FootyKitDle
description: A daily quiz where the player has to guess the football team by their home hit... one piece at a time

name: Cruelty
description: "CRUELTY" is a Japanese-made splatter horror. You were in an accident and lost consciousness. The moment you wake up, you find yourself in a nightmare world, one that is not of this Earth. In an abattoir ruled by madness, horrific scenes unfold, and inescapable terror awaits you.

name: Sets
description:
Three symbols appear in the centre of the screen as a vertical column and the player has to move them to one of 4 sets of 3 columns by pressing up, down, left or right. The idea is to build up lines of 3 matching symbols horizontally or diagonally to score points and gain a little time. The faster you make decisions the longer you will last, but the more mistakes you will make.

The author's personal best score is 9600, can you beat that?

Inspired by a video game popular in Belgian bars.

Features a high score table and redefinable keys. Joysticks and Zon-X sound supported.

name: Salomónico
description:
An interactive experiment inspired by the story of King Solomon.

This is a personal and clumsy relationship about imparting your judgment in crazy situations with sword blows.

You could say that it is in bad taste in many moments, it even gives you the option of cutting a baby in half.

name: Pelago
description: Pelago is a creature-catching adventure game! Explore the islands of Pelago and befriend the creatures that live there. Build your perfect team to overcome any challenge and unravel the mysteries of the islands.

name: CaliaQuest
description: CaliaQuest is an erotic hypnosis roleplaying game where you are the brave hero, on a quest for the Princess. Can you make it through six chapters full of branching paths, monster girls, and seductive women and complete your quest, or will you fall in love along the way?

name: Puzzle Garden
description: A short, casual puzzle game where you utilize unique land layouts and crop abilities to maximize your profit.

name: HSHS
description: HSHS! Turn me on is a virtual interactive romance game designed for women. You will take on the role of Pricilla Tang, a new entrant live streaming operations assistant, you will encounter him amidst the hustle and bustle of daily life, leading to a destiny that is uniquely yours!

name: Nightmare Files: Clap Clap
description: Clap Clap is a short indie horror game that puts you in the shoes of a house sitter, experiencing strange occurrences in a seemingly ordinary home.

name: Undersea 8

1. If there is no anomaly, go down to the floor below.
2. If there is an anomaly, return to the floor above.
3. The corridor is safe, but if it changes, the rules will change.

50 Floors: The Paranormal Investigators Prologue is inspired by games like The Stanley Parable, PT, The Exit 8, and narrates what happened a couple of hours before the events in the Paranormal Investigators.
