name: Unearthing Invasions
description: A 3d tower defense game set in space. Protect the last resource outposts from the ongoing Alien attacks! Can you hold out in these ever increasing difficult waves of enemies and protect the last of your resources and Energy?

name: Color Water Sort: Hard
description: Sin descripción

name: Color Water Sort: Fast
description: Sin descripción

name: Color Water Sort: Calm
description: Sin descripción

name: Color Water Sort
description: It's time to show how smart you are! Test your puzzle-solving skills in this water sorting game!

name: Ruler Battle Online
description:
Flick, hit, smash—it's ruler battle!
Battle it out online with players from all over the world!

name: Marble Maze
description: Sin descripción

name: Pilgrim
description:
Pilgrim is a medieval-based, co-op horror, adventure. Can you and your friends make it to the end of The Road?

Immerse yourself in the dark otherworldly horror of the medieval. A long and dangerous road awaits the chosen Pilgrims. You will journey to find out what lies at the end of the road.

Thrust from the safety of your Village, given little supplies and a powered wagon. Take yourself and your companions through a dark world to find what awaits you along this winding path.

To survive you’ll have to delve deep into crypts, unlock dimly lit dungeons, explore the derelict towns and try not to lose yourself in the twisting woodlands.

name: Hentai Tales: Another Fairy Tales
description: You go to a library and you're doing a college research paper on fairy tales, When you open the Little Red Riding Hood fairy tale book, you find that you have entered this fairy tale world. But this fairy tale seems to be different from the original one. What will happen there?

name: Hardware Excalibur
description: Hardware Excalibur is a simulation game based on DIY assembly with ‘hardware components’. Explore endless possibilities! Use hardware parts to piece together your ‘Excalibur’, unleash your imagination, and create your own legendary weapon!

name: Eiyou Tappuri no Kareshi
description: Sin descripción

name: O-Void: Console Edition
description: Jump into the spinning circle of O-VOID!

name: Super Dungeon Maker: DIY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Nine Nights: Martial Ci Lang Story
description: Unleash Your fighter Instinct: Survival Means Never Surrender

name: Blood Within
description: With the fall of the mighty Bloodstar, the universe plunged into chaos. Unleash your inner power alongside Captain Thorne, vanquish demons, and restore the order of light.

name: Oh My God! Crush!
description: What is the most heart wrenching moment for you? Is it a warm smile from the person you like? Or was it a sudden surprise waiting for him? Is it the sweet expectation of ordinary life? Or a sudden look back after a thousand twists and turns—— Oh my goodness! It's a heartwarming feeling.

name: Deaf Wish
description: Uncover the horrors of Lily's life and help her navigate her feelings to make the best out of the life she didn't ask for.

name: Observe and Report
description: The ultimate surveillance game. Monitor camera feeds solo, team up in multiplayer, or versus friends. Detect anomalies, report suspicious activities, and ensure security across diverse locations. Your watchful eyes make the difference!

name: Luck's Labyrinth
description: In Luck's Labyrinth you're a ghostly gambler in a monochromatic afterlife. Every step is a dice roll, shaping your fate. With luck as your only weapon, uncover secrets or succumb to fate's twists. Survive spectral challenges to grow stronger, but beware luck's fickleness

name: Heads Will Roll: Reforged - Not a Hero
description: DLC adds a new story branch that sees the main character return home from France not as a wealthy and reputable warrior but as the same lowly peasant who is now scarred by war and trained to kill.

name: Labyrinth: The Wizard's Cat
description: Enter the dungeon and help the master wizard to find his cat in this oldschool dungeon crawler. Discover powerful magical items and weapons. Solve puzzles and traps and fight the enemies in this real time combat dungeon crawler game.

name: Mutant Football League 2
description:
Mutant Football League 2 is an over-the-top, arcade-style football game packed with thrills, strategy, and unrelenting action. Created by the original designer of Mutant League Football and Mutant League Hockey, MFL2 takes brutal gridiron battles to the next level, delivering deep strategic 8-on-8 gameplay, bone-crunching hits, and outrageous mutants that parody your favorite players.

Prepare yourself for the most brutal football experience ever. Step into diabolical arenas filled with deadly traps, where victory isn’t just about scoring points – it’s about survival. Win the traditional way by outscoring your opponent or force a forfeit by racking up a body count that leaves the opposition in shambles. Outwit, cheat, and dominate your way to victory in the most chaotic, carnage-filled football game yet. Whether you're a die-hard sports fan or just looking for wild, unpredictable fun, MFL2 delivers an experience like no other.

name: Hidden Cats: The Last of Cats
description: Explore this mysterious post-apocalyptic world by finding cute cats and this black and white world will be colore.

name: 7Groves
description: A game in which you explore surreal and beautiful forests.

name: Nightmare Kart
description: Nightmare Kart is a legally distinct racing game that features 20 racers, 16 maps, a full campaign mode with boss fights, and VS Battle mode!

name: Easy Breezy Drive
description: Crank the tunes, and hit the open road in Easy Breezy Drive! This relaxing driving experience lets you cruise endless roads behind the wheel of your pickup truck. No objectives, no pressure, just you, your tunes, the endless roads, and enough scenery to make your eyeballs happy.

name: Platform 8
description: You are trapped on a train that runs forever. Keep an eye out for anomalies and find a way out.

name: Milfvania Ep. 1: Winter DLC
description: Save Christmas for the landlady and her daughters, and get rewarded by experiencing teenage love on a soviet roof.

name: Undead City
description: After a global pandemic, humanity has to survive against hordes of zombies in the “Undead City”. Set in a post-apocalyptic world crawling with zombies and raiders. This action packed FPS game throws players into intense battles.

name: Mister Furry: Hot Muscles
description: Unique Furry Horror with Muscular Mister Furries, Deep Plot, Great Sound Effects and Creepy Atmosphere of Furry Dungeon. Hot Milk, Dungeon Items, Gym, Gay-Bar, Pool, Locker Room, Atmospheric Music and much more! Will you be able to escape punishment from Mister Furry?

name: Muchacho Bean
description: In this action-roguelite endless runner, you will fall through endless cliffs, collect power-ups, craft upgrades and find shiny treasures. Shoot your way through an army of drones and other creatures with a huge arsenal of weapons and gadgets while the Professor puts your skills to the test.

name: Drone Break
description: Seek to overpower yourself by destroying everything in your path, upgrade stats and transfer to the next Drone separated from the Hive Mind and do it all over again with more power. Run & Gun Action Rogue Shoot 'em Up with limited procedural generation and five Game Modes

name: Super Onion Boy+
description: Super Onion Boy+ offers an exhilarating journey in a 2D platformer filled with action and adventure, in the nostalgic retro style. Your mission is to rescue the princess, who has been imprisoned in a magical bubble by a terrible monster.

name: Smile, you're being filmed
description: Survive three nights by repairing anomalies, but beware of the killer who is lurking and ready to hunt you down! Your survival depends on careful observation and taking into account every detail. Explore every corner of the house, discover clues and use objects provided to escape your attacker. Scary surprises and unexpected twists await you at every turn. Can you unravel the mystery while avoiding constant danger? Up to you !

name: Jumping in the middle of the sky
description: "Jumping in the middle of the sky" is a challenging 3D platform game. Control a sphere through 30 obstacle-filled levels, with only five lives. Demonstrate your skills and reflexes to overcome each challenge.

name: F1 24
description: Get ready to ignite your passion for racing and get closer to the grid like never before with EA SPORTS F1 24, the official videogame of the 2024 FIA Formula One World Championship

name: ContractVille
description: Start almost penniless and create your own journey. Demolish, build, decorate and purchase your own land. Build your own design, decorate and sell by auction. Create your own company and do all of this with your friends up to 4 players CO-OP in an open-world.

name: All-Mountain Hucker
description: In All-Mountain Hucker, the player performs Stylish tricks in the post-apocalyptic Alaskan mountains while gunning down enemies with an arsenal of ranged weaponry. Go down the mountain on your snowboard to wipe out the enemy faction and take revenge on their leader.

name: Super Dr Corona
description: Super Dr. Corona is a Super take on classic 3 match games with a familiar theme.

name: Panicore
description: Panicore is a survival horror game that mixes permadeath, AI monsters and a co-op experience. Try to escape and don't get caught.

name: Call of FireWork
description: Just Play the Fireworks. Use fireworks to defeat your enemies, resist the Creator of FWM, or... join him? A first person shooting game.

name: Learn to Dodge
description: Improve your reaction time and dodging skills in this topdown bullet hell from Timeflier Games.

name: The Elision Effect
description: The Elision Effect is a short surreal puzzle game. The last person finds themselves in an empty office. Not knowing what made everyone abandon these liminal spaces, they look for an exit.

name: Soulmask
description: Soulmask is a sandbox game that prioritizes an authentic survival experience. As the "last one" blessed with the mysterious mask, players will grapple for survival in a primitive land steeped in mysterious faiths, carving out a path to ascendance. Start from nothing, explore, build, recruit tribesmen to fortify your clan, and ultimately unravel the mysterious truths hidden behind the civilizations of this world.

name: Sky Conquest
description: In short, Sky Conquest is a fun platform game to play with friends, with cute graphics and competitive gameplay. Download it for free right now on Steam and get ready to jump in and have some fun!

name: No Sleep for Sole
description: No Sleep for Sole is a surreal survival horror game about mental illness and abuse. You play as a young boy named Sole who stays awake at night to protect himself from the monsters he sees around his home.

name: Maze Monsters
description: Maze Monsters is a procedurally generated, roguelike dungeon platformer where vicious threats and dangerous foes make for an original and action-packed adventure every time.

name: Little Keepers
description: What are friends for if not to defend each other from mutant plants that want to hurt you? Build your enemies, destroy your defenses and restore chaos in the garden! ... Wait, it was the other way around.

name: Eleanor's Handmaid
description: Eleanor's Handmaid is a romantic and erotic slice-of-life visual novel about a young noblewoman and her handmaid who have just reached adulthood.

name: Kill the Cute
description: Kill the Cute is a fast-paced Action Roguelite with 20+ unique characters and a lot of challenging maps. Choose the best character that suits you, capture their souls, discover the most powerful skill builds, upgrade your weapons and Kill The Cute!

name: Bitter Heaven
description: Survive intense bullet-hell bosses. Shoot enemies in the face. Discover the worlds many secrets. Break things with a giant---spoon?

name: Second Wave
description: Second Wave is an online multiplayer team-based shooter set in the world of Armantia. Over the years, wars have been fought over a unique resource that has helped the continent advance in both Science and Technology: The Arcane Stone.

name: Breathless Winds
description: After recovering from a painful incident, a closeted trans woman finds herself split between four possible paths - returning to sailing, becoming a healer, helping the resident witch, or joining a prince on a mysterious quest. A fantasy romance visual novel about love and self-discovery.

name: Whispers in the Moss
description: Whispers in the Moss is a retro JRPG with some of the most beautiful and detailed text-based graphics you've ever seen. Experience an epic story, a fun turn-based battle system, and a full custom soundtrack.

name: Prima Doll: Mumei Tenrei
description: Prima Doll: Mumei Tenrei is the second volume of the kinetic novel series based on the multimedia project Prima Doll. It is a prequel to the anime series focused on the character Houkiboshi.

name: It Sleeps Below the Haar
description: A short exploration game, set in a secluded coastal village in North East Scotland. Explore Kellas Bay and it's surrounding forests, caves and ocean to uncover what lies beneath the fog-covered village.

name: Atomic Wilds
description: Explore a post apocalyptic world in an attempt to restore balance to nature. Discover 7 hidden weapon factories and the treasures hidden within. Find upgrades to personalize your shooting and exploration experience. Get help from the ghosts of humanities past to solve the riddle of its future.

name: Vnesis
description: Vnesis is a game inspired by the eighties, a 2D perspective game in a 3D environment. There are more than 16 challenging levels to explore. The combination of action and responsiveness in the game of continuous excitement makes it unique and entertaining.

name: Red Rust
description: Red Rust is retro-style side-scrolling game which uniquely combines fighting mechanics with shooting mechanics. The game is heavily inspired by 8bit and 16bit hits of the 90s, but developed with the modern player in mind. Tons of great animation, hand-drawn backgrounds, variety of in-game situations and powerful soundtrack! Red Rust is only several hours long, but it is packed with boss battles, huge mechanical beasts, crazy plot twists and lots of fighting.

name: Selaco
description: Selaco is a brand new original shooter running on GZDoom, featuring thrilling action set pieces, destructibility, smart AI and a fleshed out story taking place within an immersive game world.

name: Night of the Dead
description:
Survive, exploring a vast island where everything is interactive and covered with zombies.
- Build and upgrade bases using materials obtained by cutting down trees, mining up stones and collecting artifacts.
- Get food through hunting and farming, cook and eat.
- Build fortresses and traps to guide zombie movements to defend the flocking zombie waves.
- Collect various items, weapons and costumes while searching the house.
- Create various items and equipment through crafting to survive from zombies and harsh environments.
- Find clues through the journals and escape the island.

name: Loonyland: Halloween Hill
description: Classic console action-adventure vibes in Kid Loony's first adventure. Collect powerups and special weapons, solve puzzles, and deal with pesky werewolves and mummies as you explore Halloween Hill's lush forests, swamps, and graveyards. Now enhanced for Steam!

name: What If...? An Immersive Story
description: You have been chosen! Step inside the limitless possibilities of Marvel Studios’ What If…? universe in this immersive Disney+ Original story exclusively on Apple Vision Pro, where you’ll be transported to different worlds. Come face-to-face with variants of your favorite characters and learn to harness the power of the Infinity Stones. But, …everything may not be all that it seems.

name: Wind Rider: Hero Outfit
description: This is a cosmetic DLC which contains (Hero Cape, Hero Boots). you can use any of the items to customize the appearance of your character.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Renault Trucks E-Tech T
description: The Renault Trucks E-Tech T boasts impressive specifications, including a powerful 540kWh battery that enables it to cover up to 350 kilometres on a single charge when using a DC charger during a one-hour break.

name: Skald: Against the Black Priory - Reinforcement Pack
description: Reinforcement Pack adds additional content to SKALD: Against the Black Priory, also bundled in the Deluxe Edition

name: Sift Heads: Legendary Pack
description: Explore the legendary Sift Heads series, optimized for full-screen PC gaming. Enjoy Assassination Missions, Stealth Gameplay, and engaging Crime Storylines. Arm yourself with a vast Weapon Arsenal. Experience Cinematic Storytelling and Immersive Gameplay. Discover gaming like never before.

name: Ticket to Ride: USA 1910 Ticket Pack
description: Become an American legend! Travel back to USA 1910 and begin your railway empire once more. Enjoy three new game modes and earn a historic victory!

name: Lethal Lava Land
description: A map based on Lethal Lava Land from Super Mario 64.

name: Lots of Things 2: Travel and Search - Collector's Edition
description: AviGames presents Lots of Things 2, the second partt in the new hidden object series! Explore a variety of locations and search for hidden objects! Play lots of mini games and solve puzzles!

name: Revenant
description: Plot, horror and decryption are the core. Players need to hide and escape to protect their lives, and the interior furniture in the game environment provides a great place to hide and help keep the game going.

name: Slot Waste
description: An episode-length first-person factory simulation. Navigate through a series of 10 unique and weird mini-games. What are you producing and who are you making it for?

name: Desktop Pals
description: Desktop Pals is a simple 2D Game which allows you to share your desktop and interact with a cute cat! Scratch the cat when it is looking for love and hear it purr!

name: Blobbers Run!
description: Blobbers Run! is a cute bubbly infinite runner for mobile android. Join adorable slimy characters as they set off on a journey to find their paradise - The Blob Kingdom.

description:
Customise your room with:
- Animal Plushies
- Aquarium
- Capital Antique Clock
- Capital Chemist Equipment

name: Break Free
description: Come shoot some balls and break stuff in this incredible next-gen graphics with realistic physics fun game.

name: D Missile
description: Sin descripción

name: Ride Kamens
description: Ride Kamens is a free-to-play Japanese mobile game developed by Liber Entertainment for both Apple iOS and Android devices. The game is a spin-off of the overall Kamen Rider Series and set in its own unique world.

name: War of The Titans
description: Your people have been driven from their homeland by war. The elders speak of an ancient land where gods and men lived as one. After months at sea you land on a mysterious island that the elders believe is your ancient homeland. Rebuild your civilization, and uncover the secrets of your ancestors.

name: Beneath the Cardboard: Be Happy
description: You will have to survive the cold New Year's Eve, look for food in the trash in the world where no one cares about you. This is an adventure where you have to survive Christmas, a holiday that has never been so cold before...
